data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Huambo. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Huambo, Angola
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 438,316 believers in Huambo, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary: On average, 6 babies will be born in the next hour to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Huambo, Angola.
data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself real to these new families.
Spirit, help the fearful in Huambo, Angola to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Huambo that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Chinese, general people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Chinese, general people know you.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Huambo.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Huambo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Huambo to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

location.name: Huambo
location.people_groups_list: Holu, Masi, Mbangala, Pygmy, Bakwe, Simaa-Makoma
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Holu (54,000), Masi (300), Mbangala (675,000), Pygmy, Bakwe (23,000), Simaa-Makoma (3,700)
